Description
------------

The Government of Canada seeks offers from qualified offerors to provide accommodation services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at Lethbridge, Alberta. The successful bidder must provide hotel services within a 10-kilometer driving distance from the Lethbridge Airport. The accommodation services are required from June 5 to June 12, 2023.

The tender is being held on a competitive traditional bidding basis, with the lowest price being the selection criterion. The Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) apply to this tender.
